txt.en: 'Now that the frost grims have been defeated, the glacier cliff can be scaled'
'The base of the glacier comes into view'
'The snarling of drakes cuts through the frigid wind and snow, portending a treacherous journey through The Withered Heath'
Instance: Storm on the Withered Heath
'The cold and snow continue to intensify'
'The winds swirl as the snow pelts the ground with great rancour, as a massive ice cliff wall looms in the distance'
